_sText:
Somewhere in the void, machinery hums and whirs for all of eternity.

You wanted a combat map? YOU GOT ONE! So, my map turnover seems to be between half a year and a year. Can you remember my last map? Surf_Machinery is another flowy combat map; if you are good enough you should be able to surf around constantly.

Some Features:
- Jail
- Healing Zone in the middle, should direct the action
- 2 secrets you do want to find...
- 1 secret you don't want to find!

Have fun with this one everyone, I hope you enjoy. For extra enjoyment, here is a small quiz.

1.  What map gave me the inspiration for this map?

That's it! Have a video!

<iframe width="640" height="390" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8XrWk25KC68?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
